context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and update their personal profile information within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: To maintain accurate account details
description: Enable users to view and update their personal profile information.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
main_flow: 1. User requests to view profile → System displays current profile information.
2. User updates profile information → System saves the updated information.
3. System confirms the update to the user.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the update fails, the system displays an error message.
